Name: team_size_condition
Description: Ensure team size is between 3 and 9 members

Name: product_owner_availability_condition
Description: Ensure product owner availability is above 80%

Name: scrum_master_experience_condition
Description: Ensure scrum master experience is above 2 years

Name: sprint_duration_condition
Description: Ensure sprint duration is between 1 and 4 weeks

Name: feature_priority_condition
Description: Ensure feature priority is high or medium

Name: task_status_condition
Description: Ensure task status is in progress or done

Name: blocker_status_condition
Description: Ensure blocker status is resolved or in progress

Name: sprint_goal_achievement_condition
Description: Ensure sprint goal achievement is above 80%

Name: release_plan_status_condition
Description: Ensure release plan status is in progress or done

Name: roadmap_objectives_condition
Description: Ensure roadmap objectives are aligned with project goals

Name: sprint_review_attendees_condition
Description: Ensure sprint review attendees include all stakeholders

Name: development_snapshot_test_status_condition
Description: Ensure development snapshot test status is passed or failed

Name: feature_documentation_condition
Description: Ensure feature documentation is up-to-date and accurate
